cid_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.active || !doc.cid || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.cid, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'retain_cid':doc.retain_cid}); }

crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'active':doc.active, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'cid':doc.cid, 'pin':doc.pin, 'retain_cid':doc.retain_cid}); }

pin_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'cccp' || !doc.active || !doc.pin || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pin, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'user_id':doc.user_id, 'retain_cid':doc.retain_cid}); }
